statements: UPDATE MoneyLaunderingDetection SET amount = 500.00, flagged = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE MoneyLaunderingDetection SET flagged = FALSE, user_id = 1001 WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
UPDATE MoneyLaunderingDetection SET flagged = true, amount = amount + 500 WHERE user_id = 123 AND transaction_date > '2021-01-01';
UPDATE MoneyLaunderingDetection SET amount = 1000.50, flagged = false WHERE transaction_id = 456;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, transaction_date = '2022-10-12 08:15:00' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
